title: Renan Garcia
text:
Renan Fernandes Garcia (born June 19, 1986 in <a href="Batatais">Batatais</a>) is a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for <a href="Batatais%20Futebol%20Clube">Batatais</a>.
Career.
Sampdoria.
On 30 January 2012, Renan signed for <a href="U.C.%20Sampdoria">Sampdoria</a> for €3.2 million. Previously, the <a href="Genoa">Genovese</a> club paid <a href="CFR%20Cluj">CFR Cluj</a> €1 million for the player's loan. On 1 December 2013, he scored his first goal against <a href="F.C.%20Internazionale%20Milano">F.C. Internazionale Milano</a>.
